entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon then light late this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
